alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County; Laramie Valley; South Laramie Range (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 07 at 4:52PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Albany County through 530 PM MDT... At 452 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Baldy Peak, or 14 miles north of Laramie, moving northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Bosler and Baldy Peak. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County; Laramie Valley; South Laramie Range
